short_summary: Delivery of medical and dental devices inspection services
description: This contract is a request for proposal for the provision of medical and dental devices inspection services. The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) has a requirement for a qualified firm to perform an annual inspection of medical devices and equipment located at federal correctional facilities in Ontario. The services provided by the contractor will include the inspection, inspection-related testing, and calibration of medical devices and equipment, as well as the repair and replacement of equipment as needed. All inspections will be conducted during the contractor's core business hours and on-site technical support will be provided.

**Request for Proposal: MDMP - Medical and Dental Devices Inspection**

**Notice ID:** 21401-28-4264838

**Publication Date:** March 2, 2023

**Closing Date:** April 11, 2023

**Contracting Entity:** Correctional Service of Canada, Ontario Region - Health Services

**Procurement Category:** SRV

**Trade Agreement:** Not subject to any trade agreement

**Tender Status:** Cancelled

**Synopsis:**
The Correctional Service of Canada is seeking a qualified service provider to perform annual inspections of medical devices and equipment at its federal correctional facilities in Ontario, as per the Medical Device Maintenance Program (MDMP). The successful bidder will be responsible for inspecting and calibrating equipment, identifying necessary repairs or replacements, and providing technical support services.

**Key Requirements:**

* Perform annual inspections of medical devices and equipment at designated facilities
* Inspect and calibrate equipment to ensure compliance with provincial and manufacturer standards
* Identify necessary repairs or replacements, and provide guidance to the Contracting Authority
* Provide technical support services to ensure the quality and effectiveness of medical devices and equipment
* Maintain records of inspections, calibration, and repairs performed

**Deliverables:**

* Completion of annual inspections and calibration of medical devices and equipment
* Submission of inspection reports to the Contracting Authority within 30 days
* Participation in site-specific meetings and training sessions as required

**Location of Work:**
The contractor will be required to travel to the following locations:

* Bath Institution/Regional Treatment Centre
* Beaver Creek Institution (Medium)
* Beaver Creek Institution (Minimum)
* Collins Bay Institution (Max/Medium)
* Collins Bay Institution (Minimum)
* Grand Valley Institution for Women
* Joyceville Institution
* Joyceville Minimum
* Millhaven Institution/Regional Treatment Centre/Regional Hospital
* Regional Pharmacy
* Regional Headquarters
* Warkworth Institution

**Language of Work:** English

**Submission Instructions:**

* Bidders can obtain the complete solicitation document and associated documents from Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French)
* After contract award, bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process

**Contact Information:**

* Monika Alexander, Regional Procurement Officer
* Correctional Service Canada, Regional Headquarters, Ontario Region
* Tel: 647.234.2934
* Email: monika
